text: These three were the sons of Noah, and from them the whole earth was populated.

Joram sent a second horseman, who went to them and said, “The king asks, ‘Is everything all right?’” “What does it matter to you how things are?” Jehu replied. “Get behind me.”

Shallum, son of Kore, son of Ebiasaph, a descendant of Korah, and his brothers of the same ancestral house of the Korahites had as their assigned task the guarding of the threshold of the tent, just as their fathers had guarded the entrance to the encampment of the LORD.
and twelve other lions standing there on the steps, two to a step. Nothing like this was made in any other kingdom.

Jesus rose and followed him, and so did his disciples.
He said to them in reply, “O faithless generation, how long will I be with you? How long will I endure you? Bring him to me.”
They said in reply, “John the Baptist; others, Elijah; still others, ‘One of the ancient prophets has arisen.’”
They asked them, “Is this your son, who you say was born blind? How does he now see?”
